Module org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting
Package org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.java

Interface JavaEngine

All Superinterfaces:
Compilable, ScriptEngine
All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaEngineImpl
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: JavaEngine.java 878 2021-02-20 19:56:13Z tquadrat $") @API(status=STABLE, since="0.1.0") public sealed interface JavaEngine extends ScriptEngine, Compilable permits JavaEngineImpl
This is the script engine for the Java programming language.
Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Thanks to:
A. Sundararajan
Version:

    • SYSPROP_PREFIX

      static final String SYSPROP_PREFIX
      For certain variables, we look for System properties. This is the prefix used for such System properties: "com.sun.script.java.".
